      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>10405</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Christian Denominations - Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">La confesión cristiana - Cuestionario</string>
            <string language="ga">Sainaicmí Críostaí – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christliche Bezeichnungen - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dénominations Chrétiennes - Jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Denominações Christian - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Denominazioni Cristiane - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστιανικές μετονομασίες - διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Find out how much you know about Christian traditions.</string>
            <string language="es">Descubre cuánto sabes sobre las tradiciones cristianas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Faigh amach an mó atá ar eolas agat faoi thraidisiúin Chríostaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie heraus, wieviel Sie über christliche 
Traditionen kennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Découvrez combien vous connaissez des traditions
chrétiennes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre para fora quanto você sabe sobre 
tradições christian.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scopra quanto conoscete circa le tradizioni 
cristiane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανακαλύψτε πόσο ξέρετε για τις χριστιανικές 
παραδόσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
